oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Captain Archibald D Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Captain A.D. Norris, Co. K, 7th TN Inf. Reg't, CSA to his father, John B. Norris. John B. Norris lived in Rome, Smith County, TN. Norris writes that a Mr. Dave Wheeler stopped near their camp and reported that a school position Norris was; interested in was filled. He writes, "I look forward with pleasure to the time when the school will close and I can again enjoy the Society of home�my constant employment gives me but little leisure for reflection�"
